Description of incident: "The Illinois Valley Podiatry Group, 3322 W. Willow Knolls Drive, has  announced that it has became aware of unauthorized access to its  computer records, believed to have taken place last year.The names, addresses and Social Security numbers of patients may have been viewed, according to the medical office."More Information: http://www.pjstar.com/article/20160308/NEWS/160309356As reported by Health and Human Services unauthorized  access/hacking. No specific information as to what was compromised as provided by health and human services.More Information: https://ocrportal.hhs.gov/ocr/breach/breach_report.jsf
